soilDB 2.5.9

  • Changelog

Web Coverage Services Details

Source: R/WCS-utils.R
WCS_details.Rd

List variables or databases provided by soilDB web coverage service (WCS) abstraction. These lists will be expanded in future versions.

WCS_details(wcs = c("mukey", "ISSR800"))

Arguments

wcs

a WCS label ('mukey' or 'ISSR800')

Value

a data.frame

Examples


WCS_details(wcs = 'ISSR800')

#>                 var
#> 4     caco3_kg_sq_m
#> 8         cec_025cm
#> 9         cec_050cm
